name: One-Shot Deathmatch
description:
In this multiplayer shooter, you can play with up to four players online to try and compete for the highest kill/death ratio. 

This game can be played anywhere, and doesn't require any special networking knowledge to play online!

Mouse to look around.
WASD to walk.
Left Click to shoot.

Game made for my Network Programming project.
Documentation for the game's programming/mechanics here if interested.
